document.full_text: canada's tmx group, operator of the toronto stock exchange, has received a takeover proposal from a group of canadian banks and pension funds that could trump a friendly $3 billion bid from the london stock exchange.
document.title: canada banks propose tmx deal to rival lse bid
lines_and_colors: canada's tmx group, operator of the toronto stock exchange, has received a takeover proposal from a group of canadian banks and pension funds that could trump a friendly $3 billion bid from the london stock exchange.
